title: The mysterious 1970 Dodge Challenger 'Black Ghost' is up for auction and worth a fortune
text: Dodge Challenger known as the "Black Ghost," which was a famous street racer in Detroit, will be auctioned in May and is expected to sell for over $1 million.

title: 'Power Book II: Ghost': Tasha Warned Tariq About Effie a Long Time Ago

title: All the Evidence of a Ghost of Tsushima Sequel Being in the Works
text: Ghost of Tsushima 2 has not been announced or confirmed, but there is a lot of evidence supporting the idea that a sequel could be in the works.

title: How Grave Encounters Subverts Horror's Ghost Hunter Trope
text: Ghost hunters are a common trope in both horror and reality television, but this independent film became both portrayed and subverted the trope.
